title: Would You Leave Your Bag Unattended at a Starbucks? They Did. For Hours.
summary_full: It is common for people to leave their belongings when they step away in South Korea. But some customers created a minor furor by occupying seats at a store without physically being there.
summary_public: It is common for people to leave their belongings when they step away in South Korea. But some customers created a minor furor by occupying seats at a store without physically being there.
